repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Black Workers in the Era of the Great Migration on Microfilm
did.abstract: "Records relate to agricultural labor, industrial work, unionism, housing, race relations, returning veterans and their search for employment and the process of migration from the South to the North." (from Introduction by James R. Gross, editor). Reels 10-11 contain the records of the U.S. Railroad Administration's Women's Service Section. Reels 16-19 of this collection include records from the U.S. Women's Bureau concerning black women.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Records relate to agricultural labor, industrial work, unionism, housing, race relations, returning veterans and their search for employment and the process of migration from the South to the North." (from Introduction by James R. Gross, editor). Reels 10-11 contain the records of the U.S. Railroad Administration's Women's Service Section. Reels 16-19 of this collection include records from the U.S. Women's Bureau concerning black women.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Black Workers in the Era of the Great Migration on Microfilm #5750 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /3012: Alice Cook Papers /4057: James A. Gross NLRB Files /4077: David Lipsky Papers /4236 PUBS: Vernon Briggs Publications 5204 mf: Southern Tenant Farmers Union Records on Microfilm 5225: ALES Records 5295: Illinois Central Gulf Railroad Company Selected Personnel Files 5491m: George J. Saul "The Making of a Rebel in America, An Unfinished Autobiography" Manuscript 5541: Philip Taft Papers 5547m: Brownie Lee Jones Correspondence 5582: Archives Foreign File (AFF) 5583/1: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 1 5583/5: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 5 5584: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers 5584 A: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers 5584 mf: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers on Microfilm 5619: ACWA Records 5619 F: ACTWU Motion Picture Films 5619/016: ACTWU Research Department Files 5729: Barbara Wertheimer Research Files 5736: Barbara Wertheimer Additional Files 5744: ACTWU News clipping Files regarding J.P. Stevens Boycott 5780 P: ILGWU Photographs 5780/102 P: ILGWU Justice Photographs 5780/150: ILGWU Carl Proper Papers 5780/203: ILGWU Jay Mazur Papers 5831 mf: The CIO Files of John L. Lewis, Pt. II: CIO General Files on Microfilm 5938: Local 1199 Leon Davis Additional Papers 5981 P: ACTWU Labor Unity Photograph Files 6034: Rare Pamphlet Collection 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6047: Archives Information File 6206: Clyde Summers Office Files 6218: Melvyn Dubofsky Papers
